THintPanel Class

Summary

This panel is used to present the hint. It is predominantly used to display the correct style.

Namespace: neTabControl
Inheritance Hierarchy
TPanel
  neTabControl.THintPanel
Syntax
Delphi
type
 THintPanel = class(TPanel)
 end;
